org.traincontrol.marklin.udp

Class CS2Message

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.traincontrol.marklin.udp.CS2Message

  • public class CS2Message
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to represent and generate CS2 CAN messages

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CS2Message(byte[] message)
      Constructor from byte array Separates the different parts of the message for later interpretation Parses the binary format below (P = priority, C = command, H = hash, R = response, L = length) Byte 1: P|P|P|P|_|_|_|C Byte 2: C|C|C|C|C|C|C|R Byte 3: H|H|H|H|H|H|H|H Byte 4: H|H|H|H|H|H|H|H Byte 5: _|_|_|_|L|L|L|L Byte 6-13: payload
      CS2Message(CS2Message c)
      Copy constructor
      CS2Message(int command, byte[] data)
      Simplified constructor
      CS2Message(int command, int hash, boolean response, byte[] data)
      Simplified constructor
      CS2Message(int command, int hash, byte[] data)
      Simplified constructor
      CS2Message(int priority, int command, int hash, boolean response, int length, byte[] data)
      Constructor from data values Generates a raw message using the format below (P = priority, C = command, H = hash, R = response, L = length) Byte 1: P|P|P|P|_|_|_|C Byte 2: C|C|C|C|C|C|C|R Byte 3: H|H|H|H|H|H|H|H Byte 4: H|H|H|H|H|H|H|H Byte 5: _|_|_|_|L|L|L|L Byte 6-13: payload

    • Constructor Detail

      • CS2Message

        public CS2Message(byte[] message)
        Constructor from byte array Separates the different parts of the message for later interpretation Parses the binary format below (P = priority, C = command, H = hash, R = response, L = length) Byte 1: P|P|P|P|_|_|_|C Byte 2: C|C|C|C|C|C|C|R Byte 3: H|H|H|H|H|H|H|H Byte 4: H|H|H|H|H|H|H|H Byte 5: _|_|_|_|L|L|L|L Byte 6-13: payload
        Parameters:
        message - - a byte array of 13 bytes

      • CS2Message

        public CS2Message(int priority,
                  int command,
                  int hash,
                  boolean response,
                  int length,
                  byte[] data)
        Constructor from data values Generates a raw message using the format below (P = priority, C = command, H = hash, R = response, L = length) Byte 1: P|P|P|P|_|_|_|C Byte 2: C|C|C|C|C|C|C|R Byte 3: H|H|H|H|H|H|H|H Byte 4: H|H|H|H|H|H|H|H Byte 5: _|_|_|_|L|L|L|L Byte 6-13: payload
        Parameters:
        priority -
        command -
        hash -
        response -
        length -
        data -

        public CS2Message(int command,
                  byte[] data)
        Simplified constructor
